alert.note: Alert for Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 2:26PM EST until February 20 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is occurring. * WHERE...Along the East Canada Creek in Dolgeville especially along Van Buren Street and Dolge Avenue in Herkimer County * WHEN...Until 815 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding is occurring. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 223 PM EST, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dolgeville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
